item.description:
**KICK OFF YOUR WEEK WITH CTMatch.com Football & Billiards Party at Nomads

Watch the game on the HIGH DEF Big Screen, play some pool, enjoy pizza and snacks,
and meet other Local Singles as you PARTY with CTMatch.com and Friends

We meet starting at 7:00pm in Red's Tavern - across from the Nomads' APA Billiards Hall and Private Pool Room

Monday Night Football on the Big Screen, UNLIMITED Pool and Lessons, and Appetizers are included

MEET SOMEONE SPECIAL AND HAVE A GREAT TIME WITH CTMatch.com

Tickets are $15

Advance Ticket Discount - only $10 at http://www.CTMatch.co...

ABOUT NOMADS:

Choose between Laser Tag, Black Light Mini-Golf, and our multiple belay climbing wall. Pan for precious stones on our authentic water fed sluice-way. Get rocked, by our heart pumping AMF mini bowling lanes and bumper cars. Build your own Nomad stuffed animal. Bounce yourself away on over 10 inflatables and bounce houses for over 12,000 square feet of inflatable fun. There's a 3 level soft play area and playscape for the young adventurers. Challenge yourself against others in our games concourse with over 50 video, arcade, and redemption games. Play on our championship billiard tables. Let yourself loose on our two court indoor basketball arena. Have a meeting in one of our conference or banquet rooms. Have a drink in our bar or sit down and have dinner in our full service caf√© and restaurant.

Visit http://www.CTMatch.co... or CLICK HERE

Call (860) 236-3343
